Module contents¶

pyro.device(x)[source]¶
pyro.get_param_store()[source]¶
pyro.map_data(name, data, observer, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
pyro.module(pyro_name, nn_obj)[source]¶

Takes a pytorch nn module and registers its parameters with the param store. In conjunction with the param store save() and load() functionality, this allows the user to save and load nn modules
